item.title: @elonmusk: China's installed solar power capacity is projected to surpass coal for the first time this year. Th...
item.description: China's installed solar power capacity is projected to surpass coal for the first time this year. The share of coal-fired power is expected to fall to around 31 percent. The US must keep pace with energy production.
